description: This file defines a FastAPI route for searching a music catalog, including filtering options for artists, albums, and tracks. It handles HTTP GET requests to the '/catalog/search' endpoint, performs a database search via 'search_catalog', and returns normalized DTOs for each entity type.

classes.name: APIRouter
classes.description: FastAPI router instance configured with prefix '/catalog' and tag 'Catalog'.

methods.name: catalog_search
methods.description: Handles GET requests to search the music catalog with optional filters and pagination, returning a dictionary with lists of artists, albums, and tracks.
